title: CBS Mornings' Gayle King & Tony Dokoupil | Nuclear Reactions
description:
Among the classified documents seized by the F.B.I. at Mar-a-Lago was material on a foreign nation’s nuclear capabilities, and former presidential advisor Steve Bannon is facing state indictment in New York. And Gayle King and Tony Dokoupil celebrate the first anniversary of their show, “CBS Mornings,” by confessing some of the hilarious mistakes they’ve made during their time as reporters. Catch Gayle, Tony and their co-host Nate Burleson every morning on CBS! 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
